comments: An infinite coprime sequence defined by recursion. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 14 2004
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: From _Peter Bala_, Nov 11 2012, (Start)a(n) = 1/2*{(4 + sqrt(15))^(2^n) + (4 - sqrt(15))^(2^n)}.2*sqrt(15)/9 = product {n = 0..inf} (1 - 1/(2*a(n))).sqrt(5/3) = product {n = 0..inf} (1 + 1/a(n)).See A002812 for general properties of the recurrence a(n+1) = 2*a(n)^2 - 1.(end)
